meanings.definition: The act of serving as a butler.
meanings.sent1: His butling was impeccable, always ensuring the guests' needs were met.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in butling after watching a movie about a butler.
meanings.sent3: The butling at the fancy party was so formal, it felt like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent4: In the grand mansion of his mind, butling was the key to unlocking success.
meanings.sent5: The art of butling requires attention to detail and a sense of elegance.

meanings.definition: The profession or occupation of a butler.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, he finally achieved his dream of entering butling.
meanings.sent2: The butling industry is known for its traditions and high standards.
meanings.sent3: In the world of butling, etiquette and discretion are paramount.
meanings.sent4: She saw butling as more than a job; it was a calling to serve with grace.
meanings.sent5: The butling profession requires a blend of professionalism and personal touch.

meanings.definition: The duties or responsibilities of a butler.
meanings.sent1: His butling included managing the household staff and overseeing events.
meanings.sent2: The butling involved ensuring the smooth running of the household.
meanings.sent3: The butling duties ranged from polishing silver to organizing formal dinners.
meanings.sent4: In his role of butling, he was the epitome of efficiency and discretion.
meanings.sent5: The butling responsibilities required a keen eye for detail and a calm demeanor.
